languages.text: {n}Из вокса Авеля раздается тихая бинарная мелодия, полная грусти и торжественной решимости. Раньше вы ее не слышали. Раньше вы даже не знали, что двоичный язык может быть столь... понятен для человека, не несущего печати железного благословения Омниссии.{/n}

{n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокса Авеля раздается тихая бинарная мелодия, полная грусти и торжественной решимости. Раньше вы ее не слышали. Раньше вы даже не знали, что двоичный язык может быть столь... понятен для человека, не несущего печати железного благословения Омниссии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A soft binary melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You haven't heard it before. You wouldn't have thought before that the binary language could be so... comprehensible to one who doesn't bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}柔らかなビンハリックのメロディーは悲しみと厳かな決意に満ちている。アベルのヴォクスから降り注いでいるものだ。初めて聞く旋律だ。ビンハリック言語がこんなにも…万機神の鉄の恩寵を受けていない者にも理解できるなど、あなたは思いもよらなかっただろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}柔らかなビンハリックのメロディーは悲しみと厳かな決意に満ちている。アベルのヴォクスから降り注いでいるものだ。初めて聞く旋律だ。ビンハリック言語がこんなにも…万機神の鉄の恩寵を受けていない者にも理解できるなど、あなたは思いもよらなかっただろう。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯的音阵装置流淌出柔和的二进制旋律，充满悲伤与庄严的决心。你以前从来没听过这样的声音，也完全想象不到二进制的语言居然可以变得如此……易于理解。哪怕是从来没接受过欧姆尼塞亚圣铁祝福的人，也能立刻听懂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯的音阵装置流淌出柔和的二进制旋律，充满悲伤与庄严的决心。你以前从来没听过这样的声音，也完全想象不到二进制的语言居然可以变得如此……易于理解。哪怕是从来没接受过欧姆尼塞亚圣铁祝福的人，也能立刻听懂。{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Le vox d'Abel produit une douce mélodie binhaire pleine de chagrin et de détermination, une mélopée que vous n'aviez encore jamais entendue. Qui aurait pu croire que le langage binhaire pouvait être aussi... compréhensible pour quelqu'un ne portant pas la marque de la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox d'Abel produit une douce mélodie binhaire pleine de chagrin et de détermination, une mélopée que vous n'aviez encore jamais entendue. Qui aurait pu croire que le langage binhaire pouvait être aussi... compréhensible pour quelqu'un ne portant pas la marque de la bénédiction de l'Omnimessie ?{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}El voco de Abel emite una suave melodía binaria que expresa absoluta tristeza y solemne determinación. No la habías escuchado antes. Nunca te imaginaste que el idioma binario podría ser tan... comprensible para alguien que no lleva la marca de la bendición de hierro del Omnissiah.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Abel emite una suave melodía binaria que expresa absoluta tristeza y solemne determinación. No la habías escuchado antes. Nunca te imaginaste que el idioma binario podría ser tan... comprensible para alguien que no lleva la marca de la bendición de hierro del Omnissiah.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Eine sanfte binhäre Melodie voller Trauer und feierlicher Entschlossenheit strömt aus Abels Vox. Du hast sie noch nie gehört. Du hättest nie gedacht, dass Binhärsprech so ... verständlich für jemanden sein kann, der nicht das Mal des eisernen Segens des Omnissiah trägt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine sanfte binhäre Melodie voller Trauer und feierlicher Entschlossenheit strömt aus Abels Vox. Du hast sie noch nie gehört. Du hättest nie gedacht, dass Binhärsprech so ... verständlich für jemanden sein kann, der nicht das Mal des eisernen Segens des Omnissiah trägt.{/n}
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel'in voksundan hüzünle ve vakur bir kararlılıkla dolu, yumuşak bir ikilidil melodi dökülüyor. Bu melodiyi daha önce duymamıştın. İkilidilin, Hermesih'in demir kutsamasının işaretini taşımayan biri için bu kadar... İdrak edilebilir olabileceğini hiç düşünmemiştin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A soft binharic melody, full of sadness and solemn resolve, pours from Abel's vox. You have not heard it before. You would never have thought the binharic language could be so... comprehensible to one who does not bear the mark of the Omnissiah's iron blessing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel'in voksundan hüzünle ve vakur bir kararlılıkla dolu, yumuşak bir ikilidil melodi dökülüyor. Bu melodiyi daha önce duymamıştın. ikilidilin, Hermesih'in demir kutsamasının işaretini taşımayan biri için bu kadar... İdrak edilebilir olabileceğini hiç düşünmemiştin.{/n}
